PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05032021-06-03TC,  NRCAN,  DFO,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
Fisheries Act
SubjectBallast Water Regulations
PrecisBALLAST WATER REGULATIONS in order to (1) repeal and replace the Ballast Water Control and Management Regulations while maintaining the foundational requirements from the regulations; (2) apply to Canadian vessels everywhere and all vessels in waters under Canadian jurisdiction; (3) incorporate by reference the requirements of the International Convention for the Control and Management of Ship’s Ballast Water and Sediments, 2004; and (4) impose requirements based on the vessel’s length, its ballast water capacity, its date of construction, and its area of operation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0120 Publication Date: 2021-06-23
AttachmentsAttachment
